name: Amazing Adventure Wipe Stunt Run 3D
description:
In this game your task is cross manny advanture of your juju.

Amazing Advanture Wipe Stunt Run 3D is the action adventure game show with 3D graphics and realistic physics.

Run offers a series of challenging obstacles for you to navigate and complete.

Game Features:
- Colorful and vivid 3D graphics
- Many different realistic levels
- Choose from 2 different contestants
- 50+ obstacle elements and many levels
